description: Rumchata is having a moment, and people can't get enough. The Rumchata cupcakes, eggnog or even those delicious shots are very popular nowadays. And just like the many variations that have been made with Rumchata, this hot cocoa is another masterpiece creation. Alongside the warmth, flavors of&nbsp;chocolate, caramel, and milk will definitely sing in your taste buds!
name: Rumchata Hot Cocoa
recipeIngredient: Whipped cream, cinnamon sugar, and cinnamon stick for garnish
